Root System Generator Random Generation¶

Root System Library

A library of tools for random number generation for synthetic root system generation.

root_system_lib.random_generation.get_rng(random_seed: Optional[int] = None) → Generator[source]¶

Return a new random number generator instance.

random_seed: int

The seed value.

generator: Generator

The random number generator.
